pkgmetadata.longdescription: Young Tableaux // Deals with Young tableaux (field of combinatorics). For standard Young tabeaux, performs enumeration, counting, random generation, the Robinson- Schensted correspondence, and conversion to and from paths on the Young lattice. Also performs enumeration and counting of semistandard Young tableaux, enumeration of skew semistandard Young tableaux, enumeration of Gelfand-Tsetlin patterns, and computation of Kostka numbers.
